meanings.definition: The middle layer of cells in an embryo that gives rise to connective tissues, blood vessels, and muscles.
meanings.sent1: During development, the mesoblast forms important tissues in the body.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the mesoblast to understand how different body parts are created.
meanings.sent3: The mesoblast decided to become a superhero and create muscles of steel!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like the mesoblast, quietly shaping the future beneath the surface.
meanings.sent5: The mesoblast, like a hidden artist, sculpted the body with precision and care.

meanings.definition: A cell in the mesoblast layer of an embryo.
meanings.sent1: Each mesoblast cell plays a crucial role in the development of the embryo.
meanings.sent2: Scientists observed the mesoblast closely to understand its functions.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous mesoblast cell decided to throw a party in the embryo!
meanings.sent4: The mesoblast cell, a tiny architect, carefully constructed the foundation of life.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the mesoblast cell danced with life and possibility.
